snippet: The former England striker Michael Owen completed his free transfer to Stoke City. The often-injured Owen, 32, was released by Manchester United this summer after three years.
lead_paragraph: The former England striker Michael Owen completed his free transfer to Stoke City. The often-injured Owen, 32, was released by Manchester United this summer after three years.

headline.main: In England, Owen Joins Stoke City on a Free Transfer
headline.print_headline: In England, Owen Joins Stoke City on a Free Transfer
